name: 克洛伊·坎普
introduction: Chloe is a SAG-eligible actress best known for her role as Young Lilia on Marvel's "Agatha All Along", where she shared the screen with Patti LuPone and Kathryn Hahn. When not acting, she enjoys playing varsity flag football, filmmaking, playing her guitar, and spending time with friends and family. She fell in love with theater and drama at a very young age, and her love of storytelling fuels her to passion to pursue acting wholeheartedly. Chloe is active in TV/Film, while sharpening her skills through classes and workshops, and working privately with her acting coach.
